Let's keep in touch

Email me

For job enquiries, press information, research questions and stuff related to Gmelius or XpressYoo, please send a good 'ol email to . FYI, my local time is close to the UTC one ().

Note to recruiters and head-hunters: Failure to send a message containing the name of the company, a description of the job, location and expected salary will result in your email getting deleted with no reply. Many thanks and looking forward to hearing from you!

Follow me

It would be nice to keep in touch, so don't hesitate to add me to your network. The social platforms where I'm the most active are the following ones:
